summary: Use this API to get basic info of merchants which have authorized to the partner
description: Use this API to get basic info of merchants which have authorized to the partner.

query.name: code
query.description: The code in redirect url after the authorization. Valid for one-time use, expires in 10 minutes

query.name: partner_id
query.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

query.name: shop_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

query.name: main_account_id
query.description: The main_account_id of the seller that authorized the developer

schema.name: refresh_token
schema.description: Returned when the API call is successful.Use refresh_token to get a new access_token. Valid for each shop_id and merchant_id respectively, for 30 days.

schema.name: access_token
schema.description: Returned when the API call is successful.A dynamic token that can be used multiple times and expires after 4 hours.

schema.name: expire_in
schema.description: Returned when the API call is successful.The validity period of the access_token, in seconds.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: ID of API requests; always returned. Used to diagnose problems.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error codes for API requests; always returned.When the API call is successful, the error code returned is empty.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Always returned. Provides detailed error information.

schema.name: merchant_id_list
schema.description: Returned when there is main_account_id in the input parameter, including all the merchant_ids authorized this time under the main account.

schema.name: shop_id_list
schema.description: Returned when there is main_account_id in the input parameter, including all shop_ids authorized this time under the main account.

schema.name: supplier_id_list
schema.description: Returned when authorized to supplier account, including all supplier_id authorized this time under the account.

error_codes.message: There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
The code is expired or used or invalid, please check the code.
The code or main_accoount_id is wrong, please check the code or the main_account_id.
Invalid partner_id, please have a check.
The code or shop_id is wrong, please check the code or the shop_id.
